title: Piet Mondrian Glass Wire Weight
description:
Wire Weight developed from Piet Mondrian’s Lozenge Composition with Yellow, Black, Blue, Red, and Gray, 1921 from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Dress your tech with a work of art that is both utilitarian and universally fashionable. Our unique glass paperweight is both decorative and functional.  It will not only keep papers tidy and secure, but will also secure your desk wires in place with a curved groove in the bottom of the paperweight.  The glass wire weight is cut, beveled, assembled and polished all by hand.  Comes in a satin lined gift box. 

  • Dimensions: 2.3125 x 2.3125 x .75 in.
  • Materials: Glass
  • Weight: Approximately 5.5 oz.
